name: microprediction-golf-hole-by-hole
description: A lambda function to push golf tournament performance on a hole by hole basis to microprediction.org

scripts.build: rm -rf dist dist.zip && webpack  --config webpack.config.js && zip -r dist.zip dist/ && rm -rf dist && aws s3 cp dist.zip s3://microprediction-lambda/dist-golf.zip && rm -f dist.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name golf-hole-by-hole-pull --s3-bucket microprediction-lambda --s3-key dist-golf.zip --publish

author: Rusty Conover <rusty@conover.me>
